Class IterationCondition

java.lang.Object
  cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.solver.condition.BaseCondition
      cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.solver.condition.IterationCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
StopCondition, MessageListener
public class IterationCondition
extends BaseCondition

Limits solver to run only certain amount of iterations.

Field Summary
protected  int iterations
          Current number of iterations from message MessageOptimize.
protected  int iterationThreshold
          Threshold for iterations - if iterations reaches this number, this condition is considered met.
